reference.scope: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (1.90 ANGSTROMS) OF 17-40 IN COMPLEX WITH ZINC
MUTAGENESIS OF VAL-18; PRO-21; VAL-22; ILE-32; ASN-33; LEU-36; ASP-37; LEU-40; LEU-41; LEU-42 AND PRO-44

comment.text: Functions as a modulator of initiation or reinitiation events during DNA polymerase delta-mediated DNA synthesis. In the presence of ATP, stimulation of DNA polymerase delta-mediated DNA synthesis is decreased.

May form homooligomers, possibly octamers. Directly interacts with POLD1, POLD2 and POLD4 (PubMed:15670210). Interacts with the N-terminal domain of WRN (By similarity). Interacts (via UBZ-type zinc finger) with polyubiquitin (PubMed:17550899).
Colocalizes with WRN in granular structures in the nucleus.
The UBZ-type zinc finger binds ubiquitin.
Belongs to the AAA ATPase family. RarA/MGS1/WRNIP1 subfamily.

property.value: P:DNA synthesis involved in DNA repair
P:regulation of DNA-dependent DNA replication initiation
